author: Z.B. Steele
description:
Brandon Sanderon’s Tailored Realities is a collection of short stories designed to delight the hardcore Sanderson & detective fans. Stories range from intense noir tales, meta musings, a critique of capitalism and eugenics, super-hero stories, and comments from Sanderson himself. A wide scope with a lot of hits and a few misses, Tailored Realities is […]

The post REVIEW: Tailored Realities by Brandon Sanderson appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Tailored Realities by Brandon Sanderson
